nodes.text: A Sith Lord who was a member of the Order of Revan, a secret society in the Sith Empire that studied the teachings of the powerful Force-user Revan, owned a compound on the planet Dromund Kaas. When the Order was forced to stop meeting in Kaas City, the Empire's capital city, for fear of retribution from the Empire's Dark Council, the Sith Lord offered use of the compound to the Order as shelter. However, when the Sith Lord was assassinated sometime before 3643 BBY, the Revanites fled deeper into the jungles of Dromund Kaas to make a new compound.

The Revanite Sith Lord's compound was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Revanite Compound in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011. However, the entry itself was never made accessible in the full release of the game until sometime in 2016.
